text: 380px Portrait of a Man in Profile is a c.1500 oil on panel painting by Giovanni Antonio Boltraffio, now in the National Gallery in London. Its subject's identity is unknown, but it may be the artist's Bolognese friend Girolamo Casio. Its profile pose is typical of the Milanese School, in which the artist worked. ==References== category:1500 paintings category:Collections of the National Gallery, London category:16th-century portraits category:Portraits of men category:Paintings by Giovanni Antonio Boltraffio
title: Portrait of a Man in Profile
